text: Endless Love is an American romantic drama movie. It was released February 2014 in the United States and the United Kingdom. The movie is about a charismatic boy and wealthy girl. Her parents want them separated. This movie was rated PG-13 in the United States, for language, sexual content and brief nudity. It is a remake of the movie of the same name from 1981. They are both based on the novel of the same name. == Other websites == * Category:2010s coming-of-age movies Category:2014 romantic drama movies Category:2010s teen drama movies Category:2010s teen romance movies Category:American coming-of- age movies Category:American movie remakes Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Endless Love (2014 movie)
